title: Google's GotTwoNew Chromecasts That Have You Covered From Music to Video
content: When Google debuted Chromecast in 2013, the streaming dongle was a hit. While it's been juiced up with new features over the past few years, we've been waiting for a true upgrade. The wait is over: At today's Google Nexus event , Google debuted two new Chromecasts for television and audio. Read more...
